body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to the Shadow Plane; Benefit: When a member of this race reaches 9th level in any combination of classes, she gains the ability to use shadow walk (self only) as a spell-like ability once per day, and at 13th level, she can use plane shift (self only to the Shadow Plane or the Material Plane only) as a spell-like ability once per day. The caster level of these spell-like abilities is equal to the user's character level.
name: Shadow Travel
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Advanced Traits/Shadow Travel
